content: nautilus 1954 is a washington-based & growing community of knitters and crocheters that have taken the mission to express gratitude and love to our united states submarine fleet through handknit and crocheted wool hats find us on facebook nautilus1954 & instagram @nautilus_1954 email woolhats@nautilus1954 com for more information and join our ravelry group nautilus 1954 /groups/nautilus-1954 this free pattern is adapted from a pattern written and published by maud churchill nicoll in *knitting and sewing how to make seventy useful articles for men in the army and navy* 1918 while the original pattern is long out of print as a historical artifact several pdf versions of the book are available for copy and distribution happy knitting
